name: Heroku Transfer.sh Uploader
description: Telegram bot to upload files to transfer.sh remotely Also Host on Heroku Easily

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

CHANNEL.description: Channel link/@username for force join, leave for disabling force join. The bot must be admin in that channel.

REDIS_URI.description: Redis Database URL, get it from redislabs.com

REDIS_PASSWORD.description: Redis Database Password, get it from redislabs.com
